remarks: The set of cyclical shifts of a word representing a closed walk is the set of closed walks represented by cyclical shifts of a word. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jun-2018.)
statement:
clwwlknscsh $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ W e. ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) ) -> { y e. ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` N ) | E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) y = ( W cyclShift n ) } = { y e. Word V | E. n e. ( 0 ... N ) y = ( W cyclShift n ) } ) $.
$d E n y $.
$d N n y $.
$d V n y $.
$d W n y $.
